name: Wigwam Coolmax Liner Socks - Unisex
description: These ultra-light socks wick moisture to your outer sock to help keep your foot drier and warmer. By allowing some of the friction caused by walking to take place between the liner sock and the main sock, liner socks may also help reduce blistering.Made of Coolmax® polyester blended with nylon and spandex to keep feet dry.Low-profile toe closure.
